sentiment.analysis:
The provided text doesn't contain a conversation between two parties or express any sentiment, so it is not possible to rate its sentiment. However, if we consider the context, I would rate the neutrality of the text as 3 since it is just stating a tool (Bash) and does not show any positive or negative emotion.

To rate the sentiment of a conversation, one needs to look for words that express emotions, such as happiness, sadness, anger, or excitement, in the context of the exchange between two parties. In this case, there are no such words present.
